violations.title: Adequate hand-washing facilities supplied and accessible
violations.narrative: Handwashing signs not available at handsinks. Corrected: posted sign at prep-line handsink.

violations.title: Food contact surfaces cleaned and sanitized
violations.narrative: Can opener blade not clean. Corrected: cleaned before next use.

violations.title: Proper hot holding
violations.narrative: Potentially hazardous foods not held at ≥135°F. Corrected: using time as control, discard after 4 hours.

violations.title: Proof of hepatitis A immunization
violations.narrative: Hepatitis A records not available on site for all current employees.

violations.title: Clear and concise record keeping
violations.narrative: Hepatitis A records not organized; maintain clear, accessible records.

violations.title: Contamination prevented; employee cleanliness
violations.narrative: Food on display not protected at salad bar.

violations.title: Plumbing installed/backflow prevention
violations.narrative: Y-valve at mop sink needs proper backflow protection.

violations.title: Garbage/refuse properly disposed
violations.narrative: Dumpster lids not kept closed. Corrected: lids closed between use.

violations.title: Physical facilities maintained and clean
violations.narrative: Air gap at back entry door; damage at ceiling tiles above walk-in freezer and wall/floor in dry storage doorway.

violations.title: Adequate ventilation and lighting
violations.narrative: Lights out on hood system and in prep/dry storage; light out in reach-in cooler.
